definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Perhaps, but many entrepreneurs go through a grind-it-out phase.
sentences.chinese: 可能吧，但大部分创业者都会经历一个艰难期。

sentences.english: Friends like capital, the more friends are the better the entrepreneur is.
sentences.chinese: 朋友尤如资本金，对创业者来说是多多益善。

sentences.english: UK entrepreneurs do not seem to fear innovation.
sentences.chinese: 英国创业者似乎不惧怕创旧。

sentences.english: It’s something that eventually happens to almost every freelancer.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每个自由职业者到最后都会遇到这样的情况。

sentences.english: I can use all kinds of translative tools (Trados). I am a professional, so I have enough time to work.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名自由职业者，日常工作日均有充足空闲时间。

sentences.english: Entrepeneurs are afraid of doing it. They're worried they're going to scare off future investors.
sentences.chinese: 创业者们害怕这么做，可能会吓跑未来的投资者。

sentences.english: You would drop fliers all over town. Online it's the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 业者会在镇上广发传单，而网路上也是一样。

sentences.english: "Cottage" seems to be the only way the majority of entrepreneurs.
sentences.chinese: “家庭圮圯”似乎是多数创业者的必经之墺。

sentences.english: Many new business owners greatly over-estimate the amount of money they need.
sentences.chinese: 很多创业者都高估了自己需要的创业资金数量。

sentences.english: I see the faces of the unemployed― and the unemployable― of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我看见城市失业者以及可能会失业的人的脸。

sentences.english: Though highly trained, he freelances without a license because he disdains the medical establishment.
sentences.chinese: 他自由职业者，因为他不屑无医疗机构许可证。

sentences.english: As an entrepreneur, you need to be sensitive to that fear.
sentences.chinese: 作为创业者，你要对这样的潜在威胁有足够的敏感度。

sentences.english: But a broker who finds lenders for homebuyers offers you a deal.
sentences.chinese: 但经纪人发现，放款为置业者提供了一种交易的机会。

sentences.english: This is a Greek word that simply means the successors.
sentences.chinese: 这是个希腊语，意思就是继业者。

sentences.english: The tourism industry believes that low-cost products prone to security risks.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业者认为，低价产品容易存在安全风险。

sentences.english: Manufacturer of electronic musical instruments and digital recording products.
sentences.chinese: 制造业者电子的音乐乐器和数位录音的产品。

definition: Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
Mailiao township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
asset that gives a competitive advantage/a strength/(market) niche
